meta.title: Rise Up
meta.comment:
repeat
repeat
Chorus
repeat
Chorus
Scott Austin

lines.text: God the Lord, the mighty one
From dawn until the setting of the sun
Rise up ... and praise the Lord!
Rise up ... and praise the Lord!
Rise up ... and praise the Lord, the mighty one!
Come a light that calls us to our fate:
Come to me, oh faithful one
I have sacrificed my only Son
